Html: Why is that? Has anyone else come across this? The other tables contain data except this one. Please help. The database is a little less useful withou that.

Howdy, Geoffrey. Northwind isn't part of our official sample databases anymore, so I'm not sure where you snagged your copy. Was it from http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/northwind? From the original 2000 installation media? Somewhere else? 

That Code Gallery resource page is where we put the scripts that were used to build the Shiloh version of Northwind and pubs.
